REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f3301 reute r f BC-HILTON-HOTELS-<HLT>-T 03-16 0043

TEXT.TITLE: HILTON HOTELS <HLT> TO LAUNCH NEW PRODUCT
TEXT.BODY: Hilton Hotels chairman and president Barron Hilton will introduce the hotel chain's newest product, the Hilton Suites, at a press conference Tuesday at the Waldorf Astoria, the company said. Reuter
